entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
